sentences.sContent: Article 1: This law governs all investments projects made by investors who are Cambodian citizens and/or foreigners within the Kingdom of Cambodia.
sentences.sCn: 第1条：该法针对柬埔寨公民和/或外国人作为投资者在柬埔寨王国进行的所有投资项目。

sentences.sContent: He said a further 200 Thai soldiers occupied small camps along the Cambodian side of the border.
sentences.sCn: 他说，另外还有200名泰国军人在柬埔寨边境一侧占领着一些小的营地。

trans.tranOther: a native or inhabitant of Cambodia
